name: Du'Em Up
description:
TIPS:

Pick Up blue cube to powerUp
Play it on Full Screen

Controls:

A/D or RightArrow/LeftArrow -->  Rotate
SpaceBar --> Shoot

Maybe I only understand the joke about the name, but is a reference of Duet game an the genre Shoot'em Up.
This is a game for the Mix and Game Jam 2020 mixing the genre of Hability and Shoot'Em UP, that is the purpose of the theme.
Is A solo game development and I try my best with the time that I have becouse I have to compaginate with my work. 

I hope you enjoy it.
